text: Pastewnik is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Marciszów, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately north of Kamienna Góra, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. == Gallery == File:Pastevnik (województwo dolnośląskie) (004) jar.jpg|House by road File:Pastevnik (województwo dolnośląskie) (006) jar.jpg|Bell tower File:Wikiexpedice Dolní Slezsko, Pastewnik 12.jpg|Road ==References== Pastewnik
title: Pastewnik, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
